languages.text: Кьява Гамма понесла масштабные потери в результате захвата планеты силами Архиврага. Тем не менее, благодаря наземной операции, возглавленной Лорд-капитаном, индустриальный мир вновь вернулся под контроль Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Кьява Гамма понесла масштабные потери в результате захвата планеты силами Архиврага. Тем не менее, с помощью наземной операции с участием Лорд-капитана богохульные силы были изгнаны с индустриального мира.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.
languages.original_text: Кьява Гамма понесла масштабные потери в результате захвата планеты силами Архиврага. Тем не менее, благодаря наземной операции, возглавленной Лорд-капитаном, индустриальный мир вновь вернулся под контроль Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

languages.text: 由于混沌大敌的入侵，基亚瓦伽马星遭受了严重损失。尽管如此，领主舰长亲自领导了地面行动，夺回了这个工业世界的控制权。这颗行星再次回到了行商浪人手中。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

traits.locale_text: 由于混沌大敌的入侵，基亚瓦伽马星遭受了严重损失。尽管如此，领主舰长亲自领导了地面行动，夺回了这个工业世界的控制权。这颗行星再次回到了行商浪人手中。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマは、渾沌の勢力の惑星侵略により深刻な損失を被ったにもかかわらず、ロード・キャプテンが率いた地上作戦のおかげで、産業惑星は自由開拓者の支配下に戻った。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマは、渾沌の勢力の惑星侵略により深刻な損失を被ったにもかかわらず、ロード・キャプテンが率いた地上作戦のおかげで、産業惑星は自由開拓者の支配下に戻った。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma ha sufrido graves pérdidas durante la invasión del Archienemigo. No obstante, gracias a la operación de tierra liderada por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, el mundo industrial vuelve a estar bajo el control de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma ha sufrido graves pérdidas durante la invasión del Archienemigo. No obstante, gracias a la operación de tierra liderada por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, el mundo industrial vuelve a estar bajo el control de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma hat durch die Invasion des Erzfeindes schwere Verluste erlitten. Dank der vom Lord Captain angeführten Bodenoperation wird die Produktionswelt nun aber wieder {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} kontrolliert.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma hat durch die Invasion des Erzfeindes schwere Verluste erlitten. Dank der vom Lord Captain angeführten Bodenoperation wird die Produktionswelt nun aber wieder {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} kontrolliert.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma a subi de lourdes pertes suite à l'invasion de la planète par le Grand Ennemi. Cependant, grâce à l'opération souterraine menée par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, le monde industriel est de nouveau sous le contrôle {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma a subi de lourdes pertes suite à l'invasion de la planète par le Grand Ennemi. Cependant, grâce à l'opération souterraine menée par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, le monde industriel est de nouveau sous le contrôle {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: Kiava Gama, Şerbaşı'nın gezegeni istilası nedeniyle ağır kayıplar verdi. Yine de Lord Kaptan'ın yönettiği kara harekâtı sayesinde sınai dünya, yeniden Hür Tacir'in kontrolüne geçti.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma suffered severe losses due to the Archenemy's invasion of the planet. Nevertheless, thanks to the ground operation led by the Lord Captain, the industrial world has been restored to the Rogue Trader's control.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama, Şerbaşı'nın gezegende gerçekleştirdiği istila nedeniyle ağır kayıplar verdi. Yine de Lord Kaptan tarafından yönetilen kara operasyonu sayesinde endüstri dünyası, yeniden Hür Tacir'in kontrolüne geçti.
